thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: Doris

author: Doris
title: Doris
text:
I discovered this company years ago. Shipping is prompt and all my books arrive in good condition, Customer service was courteous, when I so rarely contacted them. I recommend Thrift Books as a great source for adding to your book collection. I myself order hardcover copies which are my preference for easier reading ,and they look nice on the shelves.
So glad I found this treasure chest of books to love always!
